metadata.title: CVE-2021-47213 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFSD: Fix exposure in nfsd4_decode_bitmap()rtm@csail.mit.edu reports:> nfsd4_decode_bitmap4() will write beyond bmval[bmlen-1] if the RPC> directs it to do so. This can cause nfsd4_decode_state_protect4_a()> to write client-supplied data beyond the end of> nfsd4_exchange_id.spo_must_allow[] when called by> nfsd4_decode_exchange_id().Rewrite the loops so nfsd4_decode_bitmap() cannot iterate beyond@bmlen.Reported by: rtm@csail.mit.edu
